name: 李老师不是你老师
content: They settled out of court

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Aryu07066435 It shouldn't just be a matter of money. I saw in reports that the initial claim in 2019 was only 50,000 US dollars.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It seems that everyone thinks this is a matter of "money", but they seem to have overlooked the fact that this is a case that has been deadlocked for four years. Who would fight for four years for a matter that is not in their right? Of course, it seems that you have really made a profit from these four years, but when everything is still unresolved, facing a top entrepreneur with countless times more resources and connections than you, how much confidence do you have to fight for four years?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I see some old anti-communists on Twitter who usually talk a lot about "overthrowing Xi and destroying the Communist Party". But when it comes to this matter - a weak woman fighting against a billionaire, I can empathize and understand that "everything is a matter of money". I doubt if the Communist Party transfers a few thousand dollars into your account one day, can you immediately turn into a big foreign propaganda. Anyway, it's all about money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @necst4 Then this case was closed in 2019

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
To put it bluntly, if your house was robbed in China and your child was raped by a cadre, what could you do? Apart from going on Weibo to protest, sending private messages to bloggers to ask for attention, and recording videos with your ID card, can you get legal protection? Can you get a chance for public reconciliation? Can you stand up to those township entrepreneurs and leaders?
You didn't even have a chance to ask them to pay a huge amount of compensation and cut some of their losses, and you disappeared first.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In addition, there are many doubts about this matter, such as some ambiguous actions between the girl and Liu in the surveillance video, but my belief is that no matter how ambiguous the girl is with you before, if the girl suddenly expresses disagreement before you enter, you should stop, even if that person is your wife. This is what I think is the principle of "sexual consent". 1/2

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Even if this was a "honey trap", Liu Qiangdong, as a married man, also committed an extramarital affair that betrayed his wife.
So I have no sympathy for this person at all.
Whether this person is disgraced or has to pay compensation, it is all his own fault. 2/2

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @glMVgWrkDjheYXy You've watched too much porn

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Chopin313 What has affected Liu Qiangdong in recent years? He can still buy a mansion worth hundreds of millions and gain your empathy, but on the other hand, a girl in such a case basically has to gamble her reputation and career prospects for the rest of her life. Who do you think has a higher cost?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: What is heartbreaking?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I think the main responsibility for this "very bad nature" should be on the Red Guards, right? After all, it was she who spread it and caused the bad influence.

content: It's still a bit exaggerated. I have a more reliable idea. Let's just use Fengling Yueying to change the number of NATO's nuclear bombs to 0. Wouldn't that mean we can win directly?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After looking at the announcement from the Taiyuan government, I found out that her husband who was traveling with her was not infected, but her son was infected after just one meeting with her.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @FightDisinform4 Because deep down they think this kind of thing is natural and commonplace, and it’s just “bad luck that they encountered a honey trap”.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I'm going to criticize you. You, the Party Working Committee of the New District, can also open a TikTok account to promote why people should buy houses in the new district. Why are you so cowardly? You have to use public power for such a trivial matter. You can't even handle it with your own power, and you have to report it to your superiors. It's so ridiculous.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The repost failed, so I could only take a screenshot and post it myself. The original tweet came from here

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I'm going to criticize you. Isn't it normal that some people are optimistic about the market and some are pessimistic? These bloggers are stupid for advising others not to buy houses when they are good? What is malicious propaganda?
I advise you to buy more A shares. If you don't buy, you are maliciously slandering the Chinese economy.
